task.summary: Basic Messaging App interface created as Maven project with zero tests. Only displaying and exiting the menu currently works.

- Split logic using IOUtils - Renamed classes - added FileUserServce - tested if email exists or attempted duplicate - created dummy user profile via email, KrislinJurgen - not-fixed @Test for email validation using regEx

- Sign up (basic) complete - added correct .txt file extension to KrislinJurgen.com document - user cannot create duplicate email as new account - new file created with provided email - email validation using regEx not implemented - Log in functionality missing

- regEx email validation complete - User login functionality MISSING - Timestamp details to user creation and text file MISSING - removed bloated commented coding - Sign up (basic) complete - added correct .txt file extension to KrislinJurgen.com document - user cannot create duplicate email as new account - new file created with provided email

- regEx email validation complete - User login functionality MISSING - Timestamp details to user creation and text file MISSING - removed bloated commented coding - Sign up (basic) complete - added correct .txt file extension to KrislinJurgen.com document - user cannot create duplicate email as new account - new file created with provided email

- regEx email validation complete - regEx @Test bounds MISSING - User login functionality MISSING - Timestamp details to user creation and text file MISSING - removed bloated commented coding - Sign up (basic) complete - added correct .txt file extension to KrislinJurgen.com document - user cannot create duplicate email as new account - new file created with provided email

- VerificationUtil class created for further separation of logical responsibilities - complete - regEx email validation complete - regEx @Test bounds MISSING - User login functionality MISSING - Timestamp details to user creation and text file MISSING - removed bloated commented coding - Sign up (basic) complete - added correct .txt file extension to KrislinJurgen.com document - user cannot create duplicate email as new account - new file created with provided email

- VerificationUtil class created for further separation of logical responsibilities - complete - regEx email validation complete - TDD: rewritten old tests for addUser and added new test. Complete. - Timestamp details to user creation and text file MISSING - User login functionality MISSING
- User login functionality COMPLETE - User login @Test incomplete - TDD: rewritten old tests for addUser and added new test. Complete. - Timestamp details to user creation and text file MISSING
- User login functionality COMPLETE - x2 User login @Test complete - TDD: rewritten old tests - Timestamp details to user creation and text file MISSING

- attempting Asterix password console functionality - incomplete - User login functionality COMPLETE - x2 User login @Test complete - TDD: rewritten old tests - Timestamp details to user creation and text file MISSING
